text_block_list.text: On a day off, I took Shinko Windy to the zoo.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Crocodiles! Hippos! Gorillas! C'mon, c'mon, let's hurry and go meet 'em all!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: All of them have bite strength that's the strongest! Feeding-time, especially, is a must-see!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: C'mon, we gotta hurry! We definitely have to see them at their best!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Uooooooh! Look at that! The power of that croc! Gnawing on that with its big jaws!!

text_block_list.name: Visitor A
text_block_list.text: Those teeth are amazing～! If it got you with those, you wouldn't stand a chance～!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Muu.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……If Windy-chan bit you, it would be crazy too!

text_block_list.name: Visitor A
text_block_list.text: The way it chomps with that big mouth is cute too～!

text_block_list.name: Visitor B
text_block_list.text: But look at how it can stand in the water～. That's kinda cute too～!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Mumumu-! Just focusing on them, it's not fair!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: When it comes to bite strength, even Windy-chan can too……!
Gradually, Shinko Windy's mood was worsening. At this rate, it could be bad……!

text_block_list.name: Zookeeper
text_block_list.text: Goat King, looks like there aren't many visitors coming to see you this time either.

text_block_list.name: Goat King
text_block_list.text: Meeeeh……

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……What's that? He's taking the goat for a walk.

text_block_list.name: Zookeeper
text_block_list.text: Ahaha…… if you'd like, please play with him. He's really cute, but lately he hasn't been getting much attention……

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……You, come with me for a bit.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: And like this, then that, and then to finish it off……

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Naa haa haa haa, how's that!? I triple braided his beard!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Hmph! He can't get any attention because of his lame face! But Windy-chan is different!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Just watch, now I'm going to pull an amazing prank that'll get all of their attention!
Shinko Windy made that declaration before the goat. Maybe because she can relate to his troubles, she seemed reliable――
I had a sudden thought. Can't we use Windy's creativity here? Her prank seemed a little short-sighted, so maybe――

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Huh? What do you mean? Have the Goat King help with the prank……?
choice_data_list: He wants to stand out too

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Hmmm, I guess so…… It does feel good to pull pranks.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Alright, hope you're ready, Goat King! Windy-chan's prank will be unforgettable!

text_block_list.name: Goat King
text_block_list.text: Meh- meeeeh?

text_block_list.name: Visitors
text_block_list.text: Now, where should I go next? Seems like giraffes and rhinoes are over there――

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Waah Haa Haa Haa!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Goat King! All of your food has fallen in to the possession of me, Windy-sama!!
choice_data_list: How dastardly! As expected of Windy-sama!

text_block_list.name: Zookeeper
text_block_list.text: That girl, I only took my eyes off it for a moment……! I'm sorry Goat King!

text_block_list.name: Visitors
text_block_list.text: ――W-what are they doing!? ――They're standing near that cliff!

text_block_list.name: Visitors
text_block_list.text: ――They took that goat's food? ――How sad……!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Haaa haa haa! Too bad for you, Goat King!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: If only you had more power, you could take it back, huh? Being so weak must be frustrating～.

text_block_list.name: Goat King
text_block_list.text: Meeh…… Meeeeeh……

text_block_list.name: Goat King
text_block_list.text: Meeeeeeeeeeeeh!!!!

text_block_list.name: Visitor C
text_block_list.text: Uooh!? That goat is climbing the cliff!

text_block_list.name: Visitor A
text_block_list.text: Doing that so suddenly, is he okay?!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Wha-!? He's actually climbing…… Ahem! What amazing leg strength you have!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Hmmm, I'll let you join Windy-chan's gang! Here's your reward!

text_block_list.name: Visitors
text_block_list.text: ――The Goat King is amazing! ――Windy-chan, you knew this was going to happen?

text_block_list.name: Visitors
text_block_list.text: ――That was fun! ――Do it again!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Again, you say!? Wahahaha! Guess it can't be helped～!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Next I'll show you Windy-chan's power! Goat King, show them something even more amazing!

text_block_list.name: Goat King
text_block_list.text: Meeeeeh! Meeeeeh!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Kuuu～～～～～! That felt real good, huhーー!!

text_block_list.name: Zookeeper
text_block_list.text: Really, thank you very much! The Goat King was able to get more visitors, and he seemed happy!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: See ya later, Goat King! You've finally got your chance, make the best of it!
We left the zoo and made our way back to the school. On the way back, Shinko Windy would occasionally look up at the sky.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……It seems like everyone came, huh?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Windy-chan was amazing…… But that's a given. That's how it is normally. ……But……

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……pranks, huh.
Seeing her profile in the sunset, she seemed more mature than usual.
